mammals.description: Thylacine (Tasmanian Tiger) (Thylacinus cynocephalus) was an extinct mammal that lived in Australian mainland, Tasmania, New Guinea, Western Australia (Nullarbor Plain, Burrup Peninsula), Kangaroo Island, Papua New Guinea (Chimbu Province), Southern Victoria. Extinção: 1936 (last known individual died in Hobart Zoo); possibly between 1980s and early 2000s for wild individuals. Última localização conhecida: Hobart Zoo, Tasmania (for the last known individual)..
mammals.distribution: Australian mainland, Tasmania, New Guinea, Western Australia (Nullarbor Plain, Burrup Peninsula), Kangaroo Island, Papua New Guinea (Chimbu Province), Southern Victoria. Extinção: 1936 (last known individual died in Hobart Zoo); possibly between 1980s and early 2000s for wild individuals. Última localização conhecida: Hobart Zoo, Tasmania (for the last known individual).
mammals.habitat: Historical habitat of Thylacine (Tasmanian Tiger) included diverse ecosystems.
mammals.extinction_cause: Habitat loss, hunting, and introduction of invasive species.

mammals.description: Hutia de Porto Rico (Isolobodon portoricensis) was an extinct mammal that lived in Hispaniola (República Dominicana, Haiti), Ilha Gonâve, Ilhas Virgens, Porto Rico. mammals.distribution: Hispaniola (República Dominicana, Haiti), Ilha Gonâve, Ilhas Virgens, Porto Rico. Extinção: ~1525. Última localização conhecida: Não especificado, mas introduzido nas Ilhas Virgens e Porto Rico, e encontrado em Hispaniola e Ilha Gonâve..
mammals.habitat: Historical habitat of Hutia de Porto Rico included diverse ecosystems.
mammals.extinction_cause: Habitat loss, hunting, and introduction of invasive species.
